title: Monument to João Fernandes Vieira
body: At the initiative of Dr. Abel Capitolino Baptista, a modest monument to this illustrious Madeiran was erected in the former Praça da Constituição, now Avenida Arriaga, and its inauguration took place on May 11, 1924. Nine years later, this bust and its pedestal were moved to the Municipal Garden, where it is currently located.

1924: Inauguration of the monument to João Fernandes Vieira
